revised_title: Edward Ettingdean Bridges: A Life of Service and Accomplishments
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Book Reviews
tldr: This article is a biographical memoir of Edward Ettingdean Bridges, Baron Bridges, who was born in 1892 and served as a Fellow of the Royal Society. The article covers his family background, education, military service during World War I, and his career in the Treasury. Bridges was a distinguished soldier, historian, and public servant, and the memoir provides insights into his life and accomplishments.
